channel.title: Need Help on how to set commands and get codes for cheezescape 80 plz
channel.description:
I need a codes for and ::pkbox a::maxstats and ::dragon and ::barrows and ::pickup nd ::
::maxstats- description to max all levels
::dragon-description gives u full dragon and all dragon weapons with fury
::barrows-description gives 1000 of all barrows
::pickup-description allows u to pickup on any item id
Thx i need as soon as possible and can u tell me how to put them in my client.java...
Its for cheezescape 80

item.title: Need Help on how to set commands and get codes for cheezescape 80 plz
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

pickup [ don’t want to give all info about ints]

} else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }
barrow

if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows")) { addItem(4717, 1000); addItem(4719, 1000); addItem(4721, 1000); addItem(4723, 1000); addItem(4709, 1000); addItem(4711, 1000); addItem(4713, 1000); addItem(4715, 1000); addItem(4754, 1000); addItem(4756, 1000); addItem(4758, 1000); addItem(4760, 1000); addItem(4746, 1000); addItem(4748, 1000); addItem(4750, 1000); addItem(4752, 1000); addItem(4733, 1000); addItem(4735, 1000); addItem(4737, 1000); addItem(4739, 1000); addItem(4727, 1000); addItem(4729, 1000); addItem(4731, 1000); addItem(4725, 1000); }
dragon

if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows")) { addItem(4151, 1); addItem(3140, 1); addItem(1187, 1); addItem(6585, 1); }

maxstats

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxstats") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(13000000, 0); addSkillXP(13000000, 1); addSkillXP(13000000, 2); addSkillXP(13000000, 3); addSkillXP(13000000, 4); addSkillXP(13000000, 5); addSkillXP(13000000, 6); addSkillXP(13000000, 7); addSkillXP(13000000, 8); addSkillXP(13000000, 9); addSkillXP(13000000, 10); addSkillXP(13000000, 11); addSkillXP(13000000, 12); addSkillXP(13000000, 13); addSkillXP(13000000, 14); addSkillXP(13000000, 15); addSkillXP(13000000, 16); addSkillXP(13000000, 17); addSkillXP(13000000, 18); addSkillXP(13000000, 19); addSkillXP(13000000, 20); addSkillXP(13000000, 21); addSkillXP(13000000, 22); addSkillXP(13000000, 23); addSkillXP(13000000, 24); sendMessage("Grats Maxed Out xD"); }

Read full topic
